frameDefinitions: The judge or other court officer (the Authority) informs the Accused of the Charges against him/her, i.e. the alleged actions and the relevant laws. '' 'The board has been accused by the federal court of making decisions based on narrow agendas and meddling where it shouldn't.'
Two (or more) people (the Parties, also encodable as Party_1 and Party_2) negotiate an agreement.
This frame concerns internally undifferentiated Substances.
A Communicator communicates a judgment of an Evaluee to an Addressee.
frameExamples: The board has been <t>accused</t> by the federal court of making decisions based on narrow agendas and meddling where it shouldn't.
A rationale for using denatured gp160 as a therapeutic <t>agent</t> in HIV-infected people is to boost the immune response .
So far , we have <t>agreed</t>to cede 100km of coastline to Kiribati . DNI
As their gut bacteria ferment cellulose , they generate methane <t>gas</t> , which escapes from the rear ends of the insects.
I <t>commended</t> his handling of the crisis.
listRoleDefinitions: The judge or other authority of the court in which the accused person is arraigned.
The person being charged with an offense against the law.
The crime with which the Accused is charged
When the event occurs.
Where the event takes place.
The change brought about by the Substance.
The internally undifferentiated physical entity that has an <fen>Effect</fen>.

The individual or individuals that form the more prominent (i.e.
agentive) party of the agreement, as compared with <fen>Party_2</fen>. That is,
<fen>Party_1</fen> is generally encoded as the External Argument of verbs, and
peripheral FEs that do not make reference to the event itself
generally make reference to <fen>Party_1</fen>. Thus <fen>Manner</fen> is construed to be that of <fen>Party_1</fen>, not necessarily that of <fen>Party_2</fen> or the group of <fen>Parties</fen> as a whole.

The semantically (and grammatically) less prominent participant (or
group of participants) in the agreement. It is generally encoded
within a prepositional phrase (e.g. headed by with).
An expression of the commitment made by the <fen>Parties</fen> .
<fen>Topic</fen> is a description of the domain covered.
The group of individuals portrayed as equally involved in making an agreement.
This role identifies the <fen>Time</fen> where the Agreement occurs.
This role identifies the <fen>Place</fen> where the Agreement occurs.
The undifferentiated entity which is presented as having a permanent existence.
The <fen>Communicator</fen> uses language in the written or spoken modality to convey his or her evaluation of the <fen>Evaluee</fen> to another person.
<fen>Medium</fen> identifies the physical or abstract setting in which the evaluation is conveyed.
<fen>Topic</fen> identifies the entity to which the proposition or propositions conveyed relate.
A judgment is made about the <fen>Evaluee</fen>  With verbs this role is typically expressed as Object:
<fen>Expressor</fen> is the body part or action by a body part that conveys the judgment made by the <fen>Communicator</fen>.
Typically, there is a constituent expressing the <t>Reason</t> for the <fen>Communicator</fen>'s judgment. It is usually a <ment>for</ment>-PP.
When the communication of the judgment takes place.
Where the communication of the judgment takes place.
listRoleExamples: There is a clear co-variation between allergic symptoms in children and the concentration of <fex>softening</fex> agents in their homes.
While marijuana?s advocates say <fex>the drug</fex> is a mellowing agent that can be used for medicinal purposes, some police will say marijuana is a gateway drug.
On Monday, <fex>the airline</fex> reached a deal with the Canadian Auto Workers.
Mozilla Foundation has finally reached an agreement <fex>with America Online</fex>.
The US and Russia have agreed <fex>to share early warning data on missile launches</fex>.
Some types of alloy steel have been covered in the expiring <fex>trade</fex> agreement.
<fex>The US and Russia</fex> have agreed to cooperate in destroying surplus portable anti-aircraft missiles.
The town coucil members finally reached an agreement <fex>at midnight</fex>.
The town coucil members reached an agreement <fex>at the City Hall plenary session</fex>.
<fex><t>Liquid</t></fex> flowed over the rocks but it was not water.
Jon criticized Madie <fex>about her managerial style</fex>.
She viewed him with a critical <fex>gaze</fex>.
He was belittled by his long-time friend <fex>in front of his family</fex>.
